EmailTemplate.name: Licensee invitation notification - TS licensee - additional business
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} invited you to join their timeshare company
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} invited you to join their timeshare company on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You must respond by {!Associations__c.Days_From_Today_7__c}.
Respond through our new online system:
Go to {!Associations__c.License_Portal_URL__c} Sign up or create an account and follow instructions.
You must pay a $25 association fee if you accept because you already work for a different timeshare company.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI006
